description: Easy to use, but totaly unreliable. Crashes when saving, crashes when any conpomonent property is modified... Crashes all the time!

Trying to add existing gEDA symbol files. Impossible to find how to do this. I know that some config file has to be edited, but there is no documentation that describes which of several config files to edit. There is no example of adding external symbol files. There is no import command on any of the pulldowns either.  gEDA worked. This does not. I tried to use the lepton-upcfg, and it appears to sort of run, but there are "unbound symbol" errors whatever that means in this context.  Poor.
